page.title: 08NEW EMPLOYMENT IN HOOK
page.content: 67% of people in the local district are employed in the service industries and Hook itself has many offices near the village centre,the main ones being Anadex and Racal Milgo.Apart from a new block already started there are no more new office developments planned in the future as this would alter the character of the village centre.Most industry is situated in the Osborn Way Estate. There are plans for 7.3 hectares of new industrial building to the east of the present estate. Although the site is next to the railway, access will be by a new road joining the A30 and the A32. Other types of new jobs will be created by the increase in population. New shopping parades are planned for the central area including a much needed large supermarket.
